title: Couple With Heart: Man, Man, Light Skin Tone, Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple consisting of two men, with a heart between them. The specific skin tones are indicated. This emoji signifies love, partnership, and romance between two men, reflecting LGBTQ+ relationships.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully illustrates a loving couple, each with light to medium-light skin tones, united by a heart that glows with affection. Apple's distinct glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting imbue the figures with a soft, inviting presence, while the smooth gradients and rounded edges highlight their tender connection. This emoji on Apple devices is a powerful visual metaphor for romantic love, partnership, and shared happiness between two men.
